## KoattyMetadata.toJSON() method

This modifies the behavior of JSON.stringify to show an object representation of the metadata map.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toJSON(): {
        [key: string]: any;
    };
```
<b>Returns:</b>

{ \[key: string\]: any; }
